sentences: Prantsuse keele kehalise kasvatuse tööõpetuse õpetaja.
context: The Estonian word 'õpetaja' primarily means a teacher or educator who teaches children in school settings. It can refer to teachers at various educational levels (elementary, high school, university) and for different subjects (language, physical education, etc.). The term also has a broader meaning referring to anyone who instructs others or serves as an authority figure from whom others learn.
